alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:47AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central De Soto and southwestern Caddo Parishes, southeastern Panola and north central Shelby Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 646 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Tenaha, or 10 miles southeast of Carthage, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tenaha, Joaquin, Keachi, Grand Cane, Longstreet, Keat Chie, Midyett, Deadwood, Front, Woods and Paxton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
